SELECT TEAM.ID, TEAM.PICTURE, TEAM.NAME, TEAM.TEXT, MEMBER.STATE AS JOINED, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(USER.NAME SEPARATOR ', ') FROM MEMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN USER ON USER.ID = MEMBER.USER WHERE MEMBER.TEAM = TEAM.ID AND (MEMBER.ROLE = '3' OR MEMBER.ROLE = '2') ) AS LEADER, (SELECT COUNT(USER) FROM MEMBER WHERE TEAM = TEAM.ID AND STATE = 'J') AS MEMBERCOUNT, TEAM.SCOPE, TEAM.JOIN_ACK AS JOINACK, TEAM.PROFILE_AUTH AS PROFILEAUTH, TEAM.REGISTER_AUTH AS REGISTERAUTH, TEAM.INVITE_AUTH AS INVITEAUTH, TEAM.LEAVE_AUTH AS LEAVEAUTH, DATEDIFF(TEAM.UNTIL,NOW()) AS REMAIN, IFNULL(MEMBER.ROLE,'0') AS ROLE, TEAM.DALANT FROM TEAM LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER ON TEAM.ID = MEMBER.TEAM AND MEMBER.USER = #id# WHERE TEAM.ID = #searchId#

SELECT TEAM.PICTURE AS USERPICTURE, USER.NAME AS USERNAME, PRAYER.TIME AS TIME, PRAYER.BACK AS BACK, PRAYER.TEXT AS TEXT, PRAYER.ID AS ID, PRAYER.USER AS USERID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRAY WHERE PRAYER = PRAYER.ID) AS PRAYCOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE PRAYER = PRAYER.ID AND (PUBLIC = 'P' OR USER = #id# OR USER.ID = #id#) ) AS REPLYCOUNT, (SELECT MAX(TIME) FROM PRAY WHERE PRAYER = PRAYER.ID AND USER=#id#) AS LASTPRAYED, SCRAP.ID AS SCRAPD, PRAYER.TIME AS RAW_TIME, REPLACE( REPLACE( CONCAT( MONTH( PRAYER.TIME ) , '월 ', DAY( PRAYER.TIME ) , '일 ', DATE_FORMAT( PRAYER.TIME, '%p %h:%i' ) ) , 'AM', '오전' ) , 'PM', '오후' ) AS LONG_TIME, CONCAT(MONTH(PRAYER.TIME),'월 ',DAY(PRAYER.TIME),'일') AS TIME, 1 AS CHECKED FROM PRAYER LEFT OUTER JOIN USER ON PRAYER.USER = USER.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SCRAP ON PRAYER.ID = SCRAP.PRAYER AND SCRAP.USER=#id# LEFT OUTER JOIN TEAM ON PRAYER.TEAM = TEAM.ID WHERE PRAYER.TEAM = #searchId# ORDER BY PRAYER.TIME DESC LIMIT #page#,#size#
